sections.purpose: To disinfect instruments, small items, or surfaces using ultraviolet (UV) radiation.
sections.scope: Applicable to supplemental decontamination in the Microbiology laboratory.
procedure: Open the chamber and place items on the shelf in a single layer.
Set the exposure time on the timer according to SOP.
Switch ON the UV lamp using the control panel.
After the cycle, allow a brief cool-down period before opening the door.
Remove items and store or use as required.
Switch OFF the chamber when not in use.
precautions: Never look directly at UV lamps or expose skin to UV radiation.
Ensure the door interlock is functioning properly.
Clean UV lamps and reflective surfaces periodically to maintain effectiveness.
Replace UV lamps at the end of their rated service life.
